text: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 782"* Ukraine claims that Russian forces have launched a "large-scale" attack in eastern Ukraine using drones, artillery, and tanks. * Russia denies any involvement in the drone strike on Ukrainian infrastructure. * The US imposes new sanctions on Russian officials and businesses over the war in Ukraine. * The UK pledges to send a squadron of fighter jets to patrol Polish skies amid increasing tensions between NATO and Russia. * The EU agrees to provide 1.5 billion euros in additional financial aid to Ukraine.
